x-code-samples.source:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.cerebrumx.ai")

conn.request("GET", "/v1/consumer/insurance/get-vehicle-score-by-vin/vin")

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

get.description: Get Vehicle Score of a Vehicle by providing VIN.

x-code-samples.source:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.cerebrumx.ai")

payload = "{\"odometer\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"engineLoad\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"batteryVoltage\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"coolantTemperature\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"oilLevel\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"fuelEfficiency\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"tyreLife\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"distanceToService\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0}}"

conn.request("POST", "/v1/consumer/insurance/get-vehicle-score-by-attributes", payload)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.cerebrumx.ai")

payload = "{\"harshBraking\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"harshCornering\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"harshAcceleration\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"numberOfLWD\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"accidents\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0},\"driverAlerts\":{\"value\":0,\"weight\":0}}"

conn.request("POST", "/v1/consumer/insurance/get-driver-score-by-attributes", payload)

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.cerebrumx.ai")

payload = "[{\"event\":\"SPEED\",\"threshold\":{\"minimumValue\":0}}]"

conn.request("POST", "/v1/consumer/insurance/subscribe-for-events", payload)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

get.description: Get average distance traveled by VIN

x-code-samples.source:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.cerebrumx.ai")

payload = "{\"daily\":0,\"weekly\":0,\"monthly\":0}"

conn.request("POST", "/v1/consumer/insurance/get-average-distance-traveled-by-attributes", payload)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

post.summary: Get average distance travelled by attributes
post.description: Get average distance travelled by attributes

Filter.title: Filter
Filter.description: Filter data needs to be filtered on

NewCarFeatures.title: NewCarFeatures
NewCarFeatures.description: Features for New Car Price Prediction

UsedCarFeatures.title: UsedCarFeatures
UsedCarFeatures.description: Features for New Car Price Prediction

LocationCircle.title: LocationCircle
LocationCircle.description:
Location Circle is represented by location centre(lat,long) 
and it's radius.

Location.title: Location
Location.description:
Location can be given as 
1. Country 
2. Location Polygon i.e. Set of (lat, long) 
3. Location Circle i.e. centre of circle in (lat, long) form with radius.

AgeGroup.title: AgeGroup
AgeGroup.description: Age Group defined as range (start_age, end_age)

TimePeriod.title: TimePeriod
TimePeriod.description: Time period is defined as (start_time, end_time)

start_time.description: Start time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

end_time.description: end time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

DateTime.title: DateTime
DateTime.description:
'Time and date can be given as 
1. Specific date 
2. Specific month+year 
3. Specific year 
4. Custom date range'

stationId.description:
' as displayed to end user by HMI. 
Defined by RDS if available or station frequency 
in Khz for FM or in Hz for AM (string)'

cxInsuranceProviderId.description: 3-digit country code followed with 2-digit Adlp insurance provider Id.

numberOfProfilesPAYD.description:
Different profiles are required to support
Test, Production, Regional variation etc. At
least one profile is Mandatory. No of profiles
supported for PAYD. Zero means No PAYD profile supported.

numberOfProfilesPHYD.description: No of profiles Supported for PHYD.  Zero means No PAYD profile supported.

slabs.description: 0:5 carry the Slabs in terms of KM/Mile

weights.description:
The array carries weights 0.w1, 0.w2, 0.w3
etc corresponding to parameters for each
profile.

cxInsuranceProviderId.description: 3-digit country code followed with 2-digit Adlp insurance provider Id.

userId.description: Unique User Id from Insurance company identifying the user.

consent.description: Explicit consent for echo coaching updates. User records field will only be considered when this field is set to "Y"

userRecord.description: Parameter required for echo coaching and driving behaviour analysis. In case this parameter is empty it will be filled as "NIL".

cxInsuranceProviderId.description: 3-digit country code followed with 2-digit Adlp insurance provider Id.

cxPolicyId.description: ID to uniquely identify the policy

consent.description: Explicit consent from the User for sharing the details and processing

cxProfileId.description:
With the profile Insurance Provider can
select the applicable parameters and
weights in case of PHYD and Slabs in
case of PAYD. Within ADLP this will
trigger the AI Model with these
parameters/weigths/slabs. Default is
Profile 1 in PAYD and PHYD.

cxInsuranceProviderId.description: 3-digit country code followed with 2-digit Adlp insurance provider Id.

consent.description:
In case the consent is withdrawn by
the User via the OEM/explicitly via any
other mechanism the Return value will
be 401 with Consent not provided

UbiUserPolicyStatusResponseModel.title: UbiUserPolicyStatusResponseModel
UbiUserPolicyStatusResponseModel.description: Ubi User Policy Status Response Model

consent.description:
In case the consent is withdrawn by
the User via the OEM/explicitly via any
other mechanism the Return value will
be 401 with Consent not provided

totalTrips.description: Total trips. In case of PHYD mandatory

vin.description:
VIN in US/Chassis and Engine in other
places

cxInsuranceProviderId.description: 3-digit country code followed with 2-digit Adlp insurance provider Id.

slabList.description:
Slab choosen againt given profileId. Maximum 5 slabs can be choosen against each profile.
Each slab's range is representted by its minimum and maximum value.

weightList.description: Weights choosen againt given profileId. Maximum 5 weights can be choosen against each profile.
